name: Giovanni's Climb
description:
Giovanni's Climb is a small puzzle plataformer originally made for the Pixel Weekend Jam #2, but due to I not being able to upload the game in time, I released it as a standalone game. The theme was color: so, the way I implemented it was with the player being a painter. By touching buckets of paint you are able to change the color of your overalls, and so changes what kind of blocks can you interact with. I believe the idea could be better explored, but I think I'll leave it alone for some time.

 Ok, now the controls:

  • Arrows keys to move;
  • Z to jump;
  • X to run.

 Feedback is welcome, of course.
